page.title: 04THE OAKS CENTRE OF WOKING
page.content: The Oaks is a centre for difficult bo ys and girls between the ages of 13 an d 18.Some of the pupils at this school glue sniff,steal,take drugs and break into houses.They stay at this school f or 6 to 9 months and in this time they learn self skills.On the premises ther e is a school where they go each day t o learn like normal children.Some of t he sports they do are motor cycling,ri ding and swimming.they have a special system in which when they behave well or do something like cleaning up they get some points.With these points they can get Mars Bars,crisps etc.Its previous name was Kinton but it was changed to the Oaks in 1984 when the r ecent headmaster took over the school.There are 56 staff and 52 children at this school all the staff are professional.
